**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

## Solicitation Details
*Solicitation Number:* 30002267

*Expected Contract Date:*(None)

## Goods and Services
*GSIN Code:* R115A (Material Management)
*Description:* Procurement services to support the Heavy Equipment Refurbishment Program (HERP)

## Services Description
The Canadian Coast Guard is seeking the professional services of an intermediate procurement specialist to assist the Manager of the Heavy Equipment Refurbishment Program (HERP) in day-to-day procurement activities. Estimated duration of the contract is from (2023-04-01) to (2025-03-31) with an optional one-year extension.

## Selection Criteria
Eligible candidates must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under E60ZT-18TSPS and meet the specified category 3.7 Procurement Specialist requirements.

## Participation
Potential suppliers not holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) must contact PSPC's SA Authority for the TSPS SA to be added for future opportunities.

## Point of Contact
For more information, please contact:
Richard Soulliere, Procurement Officer
Email: [DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca ](mailto:DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

## Attachments
*Solicitation documents* are available for download at [CanadaBuits.Canada.ca](http://CanadaBuits.Canada.ca).

### Note
This opportunity is not intended for businesses that do not meet the required procurement categories. Suppliers are encouraged to ensure their eligibility before proceeding with the procurement process.
